title: 98/324/EC: Commission Decision of 29 April 1998 on the clearance of the accounts presented by the Member States in respect of the expenditure for 1997 of the Guarantee Section of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 29 April 1998 on the clearance of the accounts presented by the Member States in respect of the expenditure for 1997 of the Guarantee Section of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund (98/324/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The accounts of the paying agencies of the Member States concerning expenditure financed by the EAGGF Guarantee Section in respect of the 1997 financial year are hereby cleared as shown in Annex I.

The accounts of the paying agencies of the Member States concerning expenditure financed by the EAGGF Guarantee Section in respect of the 1997 financial year referred to in Annex II are disjoined from the present Decision and shall be the subject of a future decision.
The amounts which are recoverable from, or payable to, each Member State in accordance with the present clearance of accounts are determined in Annex III of the present Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 April 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
